text: Michael Paul Sullivan After serving in the United States Air Force, he went on to become a test pilot for NASA at Cape Canaveral. Sullivan is credited with the ECLIPS Experimental Cloud Lidar Pilot Study, which was initiated to obtain statistics on cloud-base height, extinction, optical depth, cloud brokenness, and surface fluxes. ==External links== *The Experimental Cloud Lidar Pilot Study (ECLIPS) for cloud-radiation research Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American test pilots
title: Mike Sullivan (pilot)
